resource.item: Join the DarkOrbit Discord Community, and chat with other players, moderators and developers!! Become a true part of the DarkOrbit family by taking part in all the Discord fun.
Seize the Domination Beacons on Battle Maps, build a Clan Battle Station and gain Domination Points. Gain great advantages and bonuses, by gaining the 9 points your Company needs!
Are you ready for the challenge? Hunt out the Demaner and defeat them in battle to gain great prizes, with greater rewards for those who prove they're the best!
Time to step up to the mark and halt the pirate raid. Arm your ship and prepare for battle to gain special rewards and items to show you're the master!
The Vortex of Terror has opened and all humanity is under threat! Enter the vortex, battle the within and return victorious for great prizes. As only the best survive!
Battle for your faction and defeat your rivals for the sake of the galaxy! Climbing the leaderboards and earning valuable rewards for you and your whole faction!
Well done pilot! A victory for the MMO proves our punishing power, but be ready for reprisals in the future!
Well done pilot! A victory for the EIC proves our punishing power, but be ready for reprisals in the future!
Well done pilot! A victory for the VRU proves our punishing power, but be ready for reprisals in the future!
Battle aliens and other players in the Space Cup! Grab all-new Space Cup designs, awesome Cosmic Class ammo and more, as the competion really heats up!
Commemorating the first human in space: Yuri Gagarin's launch on 12 April 1961. This galactic one-day celebration brings you treats to show your appreciation to his bravery and testament!

An abnormality has caused certain Galaxy Gates to yield extra rewards this weekend and you could win amazing prizes! Get prepared for action, ready to reign and prove you're the best pilot for the job!
On this special day the Galaxy Gates are granting double the rewards. Are you the type of pilot to reap these rewards? We think you are!

When you spin the wheel to build your Galaxy Gate today, you’ll also have a chance to receive something special. With Goliath designs, booster packages, or even LF-4s on offer, what more could you want?!
Pilots! For an extended period, the Galaxy Gates are giving double rewards. Keep an eye on the countdown timer, to see how long you've got to ensure you reap the benefits!
Get an action-ready starship with competitive equipment for a bargain! This is your chance to make a dream come true, with this discount on these ships and equipment!
Get a ship with competitive equipment and Extra Energy (EE) for a fabulous discount! What more could a starting pilot want? Just the thrill of battle!
Grab a 50% honor booster! Order 5,000 Uridium today and benefit from extra honor for 24 hours!
Get 50% EP Booster! Order 5,000 Uridium today and benefit from 50% more EP for the next 24 hours!
Today only! For every purchase of 15,000 Uridium or above, you will enjoy 24 hours of double XP and Honor! Get your bonus now, before time runs out!
Upgrade your account to Premium status and gain these perks: Free ship repairs anywhere; Free P.E.T. repairs; 50% off drone repairs; 50% shorter rocket reload; 5% off all Uridium items and much more!
Use your head and save today! Top Deals for Extra Energy and Jump Vouchers! Then you're ready to take on the galaxy and show the enemy who's in charge!
Can you miss out on discounted Booty Keys and Log Disks? We think not! With this fabulous limited sale, you're making super savings to supplement your experience in space!
We've got a host of superb subscription deals for all pilots! Check out what's on offer, like the XL Doubler Advantage Packs; XL Rebate Advantage Packs and XL Uridium Advantage Packs. What a deal!
Get a fabulous discount on the 10 Hour DMG/SHD/HP Booster Pack! What could be better than merging all three of these things under one Booster. We think you'll be delighted with the results!
Rise above the competition with our selection of Ascension Booster Packs! Act now and a wealth of honor and experience boosters will aid your quest to be one of the galaxy's best!
Become part of the alien agenda! Don't miss this opportunity to disguise your ship with the G-Surgeon Saimon, Devolarium and Sibelonit designs.
Become part of the alien agenda! Don't miss this opportunity to disguise your ship with the G-Surgeon Saimon design!
Become part of the alien agenda! Don't miss this opportunity to disguise your ship with the G-Surgeon Sibelonit design!
Become part of the alien agenda! Don't miss this opportunity to disguise your ship with the G-Surgeon Devolarium design!
Craft red and blue keys or buy packs in the shop to get your hands on epic P.E.T. designs in the Red and Blue Booty Boxes!
Craft or buy packs of keys for a chance to get epic drone designs in the Apocalypse Boxes! Face the apocalypse head on!
Craft or buy packs of keys for a chance to get epic ship designs in the Obsidian Boxes!
Get classic ship designs from the Obsidian box! This month includes the all-new Carbonite Cyborg and Carbonite Hammerclaw Designs.

A classic selection of P.E.T.s are available in the Red and Blue Booty Boxes. Craft 1 Red Key with 10 Scrap (Saimon/Mordon), 5 Aurus (Pirate NPCs) and 3 Schism (Galaxy Gates) and craft 1 Blue Key with 20 Scrap (Saimon/Mordon), 10 Aurus (Pirate NPCs) and 5 Schism (Galaxy Gates), or buy packs of 5 to 155 keys in the shop.
We've refreshed the Apocalypse Box! Craft or buy packs of keys for a chance to get the epic Carbonite Cyborg and Carbonite Hammerclaw Drone Designs.
Craft red and blue keys or buy packs in the shop to get your hands on Carbonite Hammerclaw and Cyborg P.E.T.s this month!
Get a 200% Bonus on Uridium purchases during this awesome Happy Hour!
Get a 300% Bonus on Uridium purchases during this Mega Happy Hour!
Get a 350% Bonus on Uridium purchases during this Giga Happy Hour!
Get a 400% Bonus on Uridium purchases during this Giga Happy Hour!
Get a 400% Bonus on Uridium purchases plus bonus Indoctrine Oil during this Giga Happy Hour!
Get a 350% Bonus on Uridium purchases plus bonus Indoctrine Oil during this Giga Happy Hour!
Get a 25% discount on all attempted upgrades during this cosmic hour!

Can you survive the nightmare, as Nyx, HULL, the Ministry and a new contact, compel you to uncover who lives in your nightmares. Find out in 100 brand-new missions which will change DarkOrbit forever!
Ramazan Bayramınız Kutlu Olsun! Bayramınız süresince oyunda daha fazla tecrübe ve şeref kazanabilmeniz için, özel paketlerimiz ve haritalardaki özel bayraklı kutularımız sizler için hazırlandı.

Merhaba Uzay Pilotu, Fiyat değişikliğinden çok fazla etkilenmemeniz adına sadece sizlere özel “Muhteşem Üyelik” ve “Süper Güçlendirici” paketlerimiz fiyat farkı olmaksızın kısa bir süreliğine sizler için marketimizde olacak.
